nodes.text: The Great Flying Snake was a type of creature that lived on the planet Cularin.

Great Flying Snakes were about three meters and about half a meter wide, making them resemble large ribbons. They had venomous teeth which they used to hunt small creatures in the jungles of Cularin. They traveled around in large groups, gliding through the trees, and these swarms were very rare outside of deeper parts of the Cularin jungles.
